description:
For the most part this app is perfect, and a great tool for beginners. However there are currently a few bugs that I have observed that prevent the app from being perfect.

Bug #1: The sound for the "ru" character is actually "ge".
Bug #2: You can not close the options menu after opening it without clicking "about Krita" and then closing the pop-up info that comes up.
Bug #3: The audio for the Katakana symbol for "su" seems to cut off.

With a few tweaks this could be the perfect Hiragana and Katakana learning app out there.
summary: Simple and Helpful but a Couple Bugs

description: Excelente herramienta para memorizar hiragana y katakana
